meanings.definition: Marked with a design sunk below the surface.
meanings.sent1: The incused pattern on the coin felt smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The incused letters on the plaque were difficult to read.
meanings.sent3: The incused symbol on the ring seemed to hide a secret message.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like incused gems, hidden beneath a calm surface.
meanings.sent5: The incused image on the stone was etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: To impress or stamp with a design sunk below the surface.
meanings.sent1: The artist incused the metal with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent2: He incused his initials on the leather wallet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat incused its paw prints on the wet cement.
meanings.sent4: Time incused wrinkles on his face, telling stories of years gone by.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor incused the statue with emotions that touched the viewers.
